translated: Elder’s Birth Stories
The Chapter with Bhaddiya
The Elder Nandaka’s Birth Story
“The Victor named Padumuttara,

analyzed: sabba dhammesu cakkhumā  i taḥ sata sahassamhi
translated: the one with eyes that see all things,🔽appeared as a leader
a hundred thousand eons ago.

analyzed: hitāya sabba sattāna  sukhāya vadatam varo
translated: For the benefit of all beings,🔽the best of those who speak,
the one who knows what is best for people,

analyzed: paṭipanno sa devake  yasagga pattaḥ sirimā
translated: was practicing in the world with the gods.🔽He was prosperous, with a retinue,
the Victor who was praised for his beauty,
worshipped by all the world,

analyzed: disā sabbāsu vissutaḥ  uttiṇṇa vicikicchaḥ saḥ  vīti vatta kathaṃkathaḥ
translated: renowned in all directions.🔽He had overcome doubt,🔽and had gone beyond uncertainty,

analyzed: paripuṇṇa manas saṅkappaḥ  sambodhim uttama  an uppannassa maggassa
translated: his intentions fulfilled,🔽he had attained supreme awakening.🔽The best of men
caused the path to appear that had not appeared before.
He explained what had not been explained,
and he caused what had not arisen to arise.
He knew the path, and was skilled in the path,
the bull among men, the one who explained the path.
The teacher was skilled in the path,
the best of charioteers.

analyzed: tadā mahā kāruṇikaḥ  dhammam desesi nāyako  nimugge kāma paṅkamhi
translated: Then the one with great compassion,🔽the leader, taught the Dhamma.🔽He rescued living beings
who were drowning in the mud of sensuality.
When he was instructing the nuns,
The disciple who was considered the best,
I praised him as the foremost,

analyzed: paññapesi mahā muni  tam sutvā aham pamuditaḥ
translated: And the Great Sage approved.🔽Having heard that, I was delighted,
And after inviting the Realised One,
Having fed him and the Saṅgha,

analyzed: patthayim ṭhānam uttama  tadā pamuditaḥ nātho
translated: I asked for the highest position.🔽Then the Lord, the Great Seer, was delighted,
And said to me:
‘Be happy, Dīghāvu,
You will get your wish.
After a hundred thousand aeons,
You will be born into the Okkāka family,
And will be known by the name of Gotama,
And will be a Teacher in the world.
You will be an heir to his Dhamma,
And will be a mental creation from the Teacher’s heart,
And will be known by the name of Nandaka,
And will be a disciple of the Teacher.’
By that good deed,
And by my intention and aspiration,
After giving up my human body,
I went to the Tāvatiṃsa (heaven).
And in my last existence now,
I was born into a merchant family,
In the city of Sāvatthī,
Which was prosperous, wealthy and opulent.
When the Realised One entered the city,

analyzed: disvā vimhita mānasaḥ  jeta rāma paṭiggāhe
translated: I saw him and my mind was amazed,🔽And I went forth into homelessness,
Under the one who received Jeta’s Wood (as a gift).
Not long after that🔽I attained arahatship.
Then I crossed over the round of rebirths,
Taught by the All-Seeing One.
I asked questions of the bhikkhunis🔽When they gave a discourse on the Dhamma.
Taught by me, all of them

analyzed: abhavisu anāsavā  satāni pañcanūnāni  tadā tuṭṭhaḥ mahā hitaḥ
translated: Became free from cankers.🔽Then the Great Benefactor,🔽pleased with the five hundred,
Established me in the foremost position
Among the admonishers of bhikkhunis.
The deed I did in a hundred thousand lives
Showed its fruit to me here.

analyzed: su muttaḥ sara vegā uva  kilese jhāpayim mama
translated: Well freed, like one who has crossed over a flood,🔽I burned up my defilements.
My defilements were burned up,
I dwell free from cankers.
How welcome it was for me
The Buddha’s bidding was done.
The four analytical knowledges

original: kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ”.🔽Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā nandako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: katam buddhassa sāsana  ittham sudam āyasmā nandakaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: The Buddha’s bidding was done.”🔽Thus have I heard: on one occasion the venerable Nandaka was living at Rājagaha in the Bamboo Grove at the squirrels’ feeding place.
The elder Nandaka’s story is finished.
